titleStmt.title: The devout communicant, assisted with rules for the worthy receiving of the blessed Eucharist together with meditations, prayers and anthems, for every day of the Holy Week : in two parts / by Ab. Seller ...
titleStmt.author: Seller, Abednego, 1646?-1705.

notesStmt.note: Wing title reads "exemplified" instead of "assisted"; apparently there is a confusion between Seller's Devout communicant assisted and the anonymous Devout communicant exemplified.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
